name: The Search For Paradisus (itch)
description:
You are in a place called “Purgatorium”, a labyrinth-like prison. Why are you there? A mysterious being called “Mr. Nobody” introduces himself and says that his goal is to reach “Paradisus”. However, he doesn't care if you succeed, but he is the only help you have. Will you be able to reach “Paradisus”? And who is “Mr. Nobody"?

Explore the labyrinth of “Purgatorium”, follow the instructions and tips of “Mr. Nobody" to be able to find "Paradisus". But be careful, your health is limited and there is no way to recover it.

There are worse places than “Purgatorium” and death will take you there.

Good luck in your search!
